location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Major William Smith, Commissary of Stores at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Major William Smith, Commissary of Stores at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that he has embarked on the ship [ Daedalus], Captain Peter Clements, four hundred chests containing 14,000 sets of accoutrements received from Bengal and intended for Persia. Bill of landing is not included.
